description: Third-semester Greek students translate selections from Plato's dialogues (Apology, Crito, Phaedo) while reviewing vocabulary, grammar, and syntax. Topics for class discussion include the life and death of Socrates and the significance of the dialogues as works of literature. Prerequisite: GREEK 112 or equivalent. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: Intermediate Greek
prerequisites: GREEK 112 or equivalent. Offered annually in the fall semester.
